snippet.title: Shelf Heroes Reveal Trailer - Future Games Show Spring Showcase 2025
snippet.description:
Shelf Heroes is a fast-paced Roguelite FPS where rogue toys have taken over the house—assemble your Shelf Hero, wield wacky weapons, and blast enemies into plastic bits solo or in chaotic 3-player co-op!
Check it out on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3151140/Shelf_Heroes

https://www.youtube.com/@FutureGamesShow

#FutureGamesShow #FGS #shelfheroes

Future Publishing uses the Epidemic Sound Library and Adobe Creative Cloud Generative AI features
